title: Incendiary Bombs
contents: Incendiary bombs act somewhat similarly to ground-based Flamer weapons.
Incendiary bombs deal low damage on impact, but will instantly ignite a large area around the impact site.
Enemy units and structures that linger within this area will take a large amount of damage over time.
Like Flamer weapons, incendiary bombs are excellent againt all unit types and bunkers, but are weak against hardened structures.
